title: Historian on the American System - cause

content.question: Which of the following most directly made possible the ideas described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The emergence of monopolies that dominated entire businesses
Innovations including textile machinery, steam engines, and interchangeable parts
Farmersâ€™ creation of local, regional, and national organizations that resisted corporate power
The significant influence of organized labor unions

content.answer: Innovations including textile machinery, steam engines, and interchangeable parts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
